price: Babalitaan ang tao sa Araw na iyon hinggil sa ipinauna niya at ipinahuli niya.[696]
arabic: يُنَبَّؤُاْ ٱلۡإِنسَٰنُ يَوۡمَئِذِۭ بِمَا قَدَّمَ وَأَخَّرَ
footnotes: [696] na gawang mabuti at gawang masama.

version.title: Filipino (Tagalog) Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Tagalog by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: yunabba-u al-insānu yawma-idhin bimā qaddama wa-akhara
